text: Baldwin Jacobson Lonsdale (21 February 1950 - 17 June 2017) was a ni-Vanuatu politician and Anglican priest. He served as President of Vanuatu from 22 September 2014 until his death in 2017. He was born in Monte Lava. Lonsdale died on 17 June 2017 in Port Vila of a heart attack, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1950 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Anglican priests Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Vanuatu
title: Baldwin Lonsdale
